record.text: I was double-billed when I used WhereToSleep.com I paid them and then I had to also pay Galdat Suites hotel. It took me many calls to their customer service to reach anyone - I had to keep calling back. They'd say "We are working on this sir, please call back in 24 hours". Over and over! I don't know why, but they would not ever call me back or let escalate to a supervisor. I shouldn't have had to pay the hotel, but they insist I resolve it with WhereToSleep.com. If the hotel just refunded my money, I'd be happy.
